message.body: Pick you guys up a little after 5? What time works for ya'll?
Hhmm.. Well we both get off work exactly at 5 o'clock so will still need to actually get home and Button things up.
I'll text danielle AMD see if she needs time
Word up. Just let me know!
I've made some calculations and I have a time in mind but I'd like to ask you first, in a perfect world, what time would you prefer to leave ideally?
That's fine with me. Stop by around 6 or 615 and you and I will pack up the car while Danielle is finishing up whatever she needs to do if she even needs time at all. ...and well be on our way.
Yup! We don't need bikes so it should be pretty easy. Do you think I should bring my chainsaw?
Haha, I doubt you'll need it.
Yeah. Just gonna be on a tight budget. Glad we weren't depending on my car to get us there.
